LEAD: The William Esty Company, one of the multitude of agencies to bear the Saatchi & Saatchi stamp, has gotten an additional creative assignment from Brown & Williamson Tobacco, a subsidiary of Batus Holdings.

The William Esty Company, one of the multitude of agencies to bear the Saatchi & Saatchi stamp, has gotten an additional creative assignment from Brown & Williamson Tobacco, a subsidiary of Batus Holdings.

It is for Viceroy cigarettes, which had not been getting any advertising. It joins the Kool and Barclay brands, which are also getting their advertising from Esty. All media buying for B.&W. products is done by the Ogilvy Group's Ogilvy & Mather, Chicago.
